channel.title: Clean energy industry on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Clean energy industry on FinanClub

item.title: PLUG
item.description: score:52 Chances: Plug Power installed electrolyzer capable of powering more than 225 hydrogen fuel cell-powered forklift trucks at Amazon fulfillment center, showing potential for increased adoption of hydrogen technology in the material handling market.New proposed rules from the government could affect the hydrogen industry, creating uncertainty for future hydrogen projects and potential impact on Plug Power’s business.

item.title: ARRY
item.description: score:437 Chances: Solar power stocks received a boost from Jefferies, which initiated coverage on some of the biggest companies in the sector. Falling interest rates have fueled Array Technologies’ stock this week. The projected fair value for Array Technologies is US$36.63 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity… Jessica Lawrence-Vaca, Senior Vice President, Policy and External Affairs, Array Technologies ALBUQUERQUE, N.
